title: On the Efficiency of Consensus Algorithms in Dynamic Networks
abstract: This paper explores consensus mechanisms in networks with changing topologies, proposing optimizations for fault tolerance and performance.
content:
# On the Efficiency of Consensus Algorithms in Dynamic Networks

This work studies consensus algorithms under dynamic topologies. We analyze worst-case and average-case behavior, and propose optimizations to tolerate transient partitions.

title: Reproducibility in Computational Research: A Case Study
abstract: An analysis of reproducibility challenges in computational experiments, with practical guidelines for researchers.
content:
# Reproducibility in Computational Research: A Case Study

This case study documents the reproducibility challenges we encountered and the solutions that helped us produce stable, sharable computational results. Includes Docker, notebooks, and CI patterns.
